document.heading: Education Commission of the States Participation Act of 1983

history.narrative: Law 5-65, “Education Commission of the States Participation Act of 1983,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-270, which was referred to the Committee on Education. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 20, 1983, and January 3, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 11, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-98 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
